definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: It also adds a corresponding toggle button into the toolbar.
sentences.chinese: 它在工具條中添加了一個相應的觸發按鈕。

sentences.english: The add-on bar that resides in the bottom is a pain to use.
sentences.chinese: 把加載項工具條放在底部使用起來是一個痛苦。
是美國在線安全工具條。

sentences.english: These different soft key bar states are described in the following table.
sentences.chinese: 這些不同的軟鍵工具條狀態在下表中進行一一描述。

sentences.english: Just move your cursor over the space between the sidebar and the list of artifacts.
sentences.chinese: 將您的鼠標移動到工具條和工件列表之間的空隙處。

sentences.english: i think they should enlarge the tool bar section, visually. all the devs work on massive monitors so they lose touch with this stuff sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得他們在工具條區域應該視覺上擴大一點。

sentences.english: Use the combo box in the toolbar to quickly switch between different method configurations.
sentences.chinese: 使用工具條中的組合框來在不同方法配置中迅速切換。

sentences.english: Chiseled nice looking sidebars, and clear-cut content area highlighted for easy reading.
sentences.chinese: 鑿痕好看工具條，並明確的內容區域，方便閱讀突出。

sentences.english: These comments are selected in the sidebar when the element is selected.
sentences.chinese: 當元素被選中時，這些註釋會在工具條內被選中。

sentences.english: Requirements that are related to an artifact appear in a separate sidebar.
sentences.chinese: 與工件相關的需求會出現在單獨的工具條中。

sentences.english: In the manual mode, the progress bar does not move independently.
sentences.chinese: 在手動操作模式中，這個進度工具條不會獨立地移動。
